testsuite.name: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: Then Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "Remove Content 1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: And I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: Then I see that I am on the Content Repository page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: When I expand the "Text" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: And I select the question by name "Remove Content 1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: And I click the "Remove" button in the bulk row
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: And I click the Confirm option
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: Then I see an error message stating that the content cannot be removed
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Attempt to remove content from root group

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Verify TOS URL when sharing to Cloud ?[90m# QuestionInRepository.feature:48?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click on "Questions"?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.clickOnQuestions()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI select the question by name "?[0m?[32m?[1mStudent Readiness?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.selectQuestion(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the Share button?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.clickShareButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mthe Share dialog is visible?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.assertShareDialogVisible()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mverify the Terms of Service URL is "?[0m?[32m?[1mhttps://www.digitaled.com/cloud/terms.aspx?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.assertShareDialogTosUrl(String)?[0m
